article.title: MTNT Energy to Provide Electrical and Communication Services in Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: MTNT Energy Incorporated, Anchorage, Alaska, was awarded a $9,500,000 firm-fixed-price contract for the installation of new electrical and communication services in support of United States forces in Afghanistan. Work will be performed in Afghanistan, with an estimated completion date of March 15, 2013. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Philadelphia, Pennslvania, is the contracting activity.
